name: Harder Jump
description:
Harder Jump

A game where logic and physics are not on your side, a game where you will be red with fury.

A game based on I Wanna Be The Guy and Super Meat Boy.

The goal is to get to the other side of the test chamber ... I SAY ... uh level.

Follow me on Twitter to know more:https://twitter.com/birdsickgames1

Follow me on the blog to know more:https://bird-sick-games.blogspot.com/
